title: Spiritual Energy from Physical Objects
description: Take a look at how religious items provide meaning in three Americans' lives.
cleaned_text: Spiritual Energy from Physical Objects 4 in 10 American adults believe spiritual energy can be found in physical objects In tough times like these, many people turn to their faith. And some Americans — 4 in 10, in fact — say they find spiritual energy in physical objects. Let's take a look at how religious items provide meaning in three Americans' lives.
